name: Jumpalot
description:
Jumpalot!

We are free falling along with other people, animals and objects!

But you are too young to die!

Try to survive as much time as you can by bouncing off everything you can step on, and try to achieve all your life goals in one go!

Find the love of your life

Adopt a pet to keep you company, shortly...

Buy the car of your dreams

Get that university degree you always wished

If this is the end, let's at least do it in style! Controls

Movement: A and D

Jump: Space

Tools

Unity

Aseprite


Credits

Gustavo "Lobo" Peñas

Marcos Briz Rangel

Hernan Manso Blanco

Jorge Fernández Hurtado

Aida Rodríguez Ugarte

Ignacio "Blugart" Muñoz Márquez
